name: 214-68 winter smiles headband
notes:
**knitted head band with cable in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk. sizes s - xl.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern no z-928
yarn group a + a or c

-------------------------------------------------------

**sizes**:
s/m – m/l – l/xl
fits head size approx.: 54/56 – 56/58 – 58/60 cm.
height approx.: 10/11 – 11/12 – 12/13 cm.

**materials**:
drops alpaca from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
50-50-50 g colour 9025, hazelnut
and use:
drops kid-silk from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
25-25-25 g colour 33, rust

or use the following colour-combinations:
drops alpaca 9026, blush and drops kid-silk 33, rust
drops alpaca 7323, sea fog and drops kid-silk 34, sage green
drops alpaca 2923, goldenrod and drops kid-silk 30, curry
drops alpaca 2020, light nougat and drops kid-silk 20, light beige

**knitting tension**:
17 stitches in width and 22 rows in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality (= 2 strands) = 10 x 10 cm.

needles:
drops double pointed needles size 5 mm.
needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
